festival_info.name: Ignus 2026
festival_info.description: IGNUS, the annual socio-cultural festival of IIT Jodhpur, has grown to become the largest fest in Northwest India. A mesmerizing celebration where students from across the country come together to compete and collaborate in diverse cultural events.

qna.q: Where is the festival happening?
qna.a: The festival takes place at the IIT Jodhpur Permanent Campus in Karwar, Jodhpur, roughly 25km from the city center via the Nagaur Road.

qna.q: Who can attend Ignus?
qna.a: Ignus is open to college students from across India. You must have a valid college ID and an Ignus Pass to enter. Faculty and staff are also welcome.

qna.q: Is there an entry fee?
qna.a: Yes, access to the festival grounds and Pronites requires a valid Pass (Imperial, Royal, or Day Pass). Specific competitions may also have participation fees.

qna.q: How do I reach IIT Jodhpur?
qna.a: IIT Jodhpur is located on NH 65 (Nagaur Road). It is well connected by road to Jodhpur city. You can take a taxi or auto-rickshaw from the Railway Station or Airport.

qna.q: Is transportation provided by the fest?
qna.a: Yes, bus services will be provided from key locations in Jodhpur city to the campus for registered participants. Detailed bus schedules will be available on our social media handles.

qna.q: How far is the campus from the Railway Station/Airport?
qna.a: The campus is approximately 30km from Jodhpur Railway Station and 32km from Jodhpur Airport. Travel time is around 45-60 minutes.

qna.q: What are the details and prices of the Main Passes?
qna.a:
**Imperial Gold (₹2,799)**:
- Entire fest pass.
- Gold Lane access.
- Accommodation included.
- Free access to participate in one event per day (excluding Flagship).

**Imperial Silver (₹2,599)**:
- Entire fest pass.
- Silver Lane access.
- Accommodation included.
- Free access to participate in one event per day (excluding Flagship).

**Royal Gold (₹1,199)** (Exclusively for Jodhpur residents):
- Entire fest entry pass.
- Gold Lane access.
- Free access to participate in one event per day (excluding Flagship).

**Royal Silver (₹999)** (Exclusively for Jodhpur residents):
- Entire fest entry pass.
- Silver Lane access.
- Free access to participate in one event per day (excluding Flagship).

qna.q: Are there passes for only the final day (Pronites)?
qna.a:
Yes, we have Pronites Passes for the Final Day:

**Gold Pronites Pass (₹699)**:
- Final Day Entry Pass.
- Gold Lane access.
- Free access to participate in any one event on the final day.

**Silver Pronites Pass (₹499)**:
- Final Day Entry Pass.
- Silver Lane access.
- Free access to terminate in any one event on the final day.

qna.q: Are there special passes for Executive or School students?
qna.a:
**Executive Imperial (₹2,099)**: Discounted Imperial Gold Pass for executive Students.

**Executive Royal / School Student (₹599)**: Discounted Royal Gold Pass for executive Students and for school students participating in events only.

qna.q: How do I buy a pass?
qna.a: Go to the 'Passes' section in the app, select your preferred pass type, fill in details, and proceed to payment via UPI or Card.

qna.q: Are refunds available?
qna.a: No, all pass sales are final. Passes are non-refundable and non-transferable.

qna.q: Is accommodation provided?
qna.a: Accommodation is included *only* with the Imperial Pass for participants coming from outside Jodhpur. It is provided on a shared basis in campus hostels or arranged off-campus accommodation.

qna.q: What facilities are provided in accommodation?
qna.a: We provide basic bedding (mattress, pillow). You are advised to bring your own toiletries, locks, and light blankets/sheets for hygiene.

qna.q: Is food included in the pass?
qna.a: No, food is not included in the pass fees. However, the campus has multiple food courts, canteens, and food stalls set up for the fest serving a variety of cuisines at affordable rates.

qna.q: What are the check-in and check-out times?
qna.a: Check-in starts at 10 AM on Feb 6th. Check-out must be completed by 10 AM on Feb 10th.

qna.q: What are the rules for Nrityansh (Group Dance)?
qna.a:
**Nrityansh**
Description: Group dance competition.
Team Size: 7-30 members.
Duration: 7-15 minutes (including setup).
Rules: Minimum 5 members on stage. All dance forms allowed. No fluids/flames/heavy objects.
Penalty: Points deducted for exceeding time (20/30/40 pts), stopped if >3 mins over.
Judging: Coordination (25%), Choreography (25%), Energy (15%), Creativity (15%).

qna.q: What are the rules for Solo Dance?
qna.a:
**Solo Dance**
Team Size: 1.
Duration: Prelims 1-4 mins, Finals 2-6 mins.
Rules: All forms allowed. Music must be submitted 1 day prior. No vulgarity.
Judging: Choreography (30%), Energy (25%), Innovation (20%).

qna.q: What are the rules for Duet Dance?
qna.a:
**Duet Dance**
Team Size: 2.
Duration: Prelims 1.5-5 mins, Finals 2-6 mins.
Rules: All forms allowed. Props allowed (discretionary).
Judging: Choreography (30%), Energy (25%), Coordination (25%).

qna.q: What is the Street Battle?
qna.a:
**Street Battle**
Description: Solo dance battle format.
Rounds: 3 rounds (45s each). Same song for both competitors.
Rules: Perform any routine for at least 30s. No vulgar/aggressive moves.
Judging: Musicality (35%), Synchronization (20%).

qna.q: How do I submit my music track for Dance events?
qna.a: Tracks must be submitted at least **one day before** the event. Bring them on a **CD/DVD or Pen Drive** in **.cda or .mp3** format. Phone/Bluetooth transfer is NOT allowed.

qna.q: What are the rules for Clash of Bands?
qna.a:
**Clash of Bands**
Team Size: 4-15.
Time Limit: 20+5 mins (performance) + 20+5 mins (soundcheck).
Rules: At least 3 instruments on stage. Only drums provided. No pre-recorded tracks. DAW allowed if triggered physically.
Judging: Synchronization (30%), Technical Brilliance (25%), Overall Impact (20%).

qna.q: What are the rules for Solo Singing?
qna.a:
**Solo Singing**
Team Size: 1.
Time Limit: Prelims 2-3 mins, Finals 5 mins (up to 2 songs).
Rules: No karaoke/recorded tracks. Only 1 acoustic/percussion accompaniment allowed in finals.
Coordinator: Raghav (8825997508 - Rap Battle).

qna.q: What are the rules for Pair on Stage?
qna.a:
**Pair on Stage**
Team Size: 2.
Time Limit: 8 minutes.
Rules: Any combination of instruments/vocals. Live looping allowed. No karaoke.
Judging: Creativity (25%), Synchronization (20%), Overall Impact (20%).

qna.q: What are the rules for Rap Battle?
qna.a:
**Rap Battle**
Team Size: 1.
Time Limit: 1-4 minutes.
Rules: No pre-recorded vocals. Bring own beats (mp3). No vulgarity/slurs.
Coordinator: Raghav (8825997508).

qna.q: Do I need to bring my own instruments?
qna.a: Yes. Only a standard 5-piece Drum Kit is provided. Participants must bring all other instruments (Guitars, Keyboards, etc.), cables, and processors.

qna.q: What are the rules for Nukkad (Aayaam)?
qna.a:
**Aayaam (Nukkad)**
Team Size: 7-25.
Time Limit: 20-30 mins + 2 min setup.
Rules: English/Hindi. No mild obscenity. Deduction for exceeding time.
Judging: Acting/Energy (40%), Script (20%), Direction (20%).

qna.q: What are the rules for Stage Play?
qna.a:
**Stage Play**
Team Size: Max 25.
Time Limit: 45 minutes.
Rules: English/Hindi. Original or adapted scripts. 30% penalty for stage damage.
Judging: Acting (35%), Script (35%), Lights/Music (15%).

qna.q: What are the rules for Mono Acting?
qna.a:
**Mono Acting**
Team Size: 1 (+3 background).
Time Limit: 7 minutes.
Rules: English/Hindi. Backstage voiceovers allowed. Props allowed.

qna.q: What are the rules for Mime?
qna.a:
**Mime**
Team Size: 5-13.
Time Limit: 5-10 minutes.
Rules: No dialogue/voiceover. Background music allowed (no words).

qna.q: What Fine Arts competitions are there?
qna.a:
**Face Painting**: 2-4 members, 3 hrs.
**T-Shirt Painting**: 2-3 members, 3 hrs.
**Charcoal Painting**: Solo, 3 hrs.
**Doodling**: Solo, 2 days.
**Rapido**: Group (2-3), 3 rounds (30/20/10 mins). Draw same image with decreasing time.
**Costume Designing**: Group, 4 hrs. Create costume from newspapers/wires etc.

qna.q: What are the rules for Antarang (Fashion Show)?
qna.a:
**Antarang**
Team Size: 8-24.
Duration: Prelims 4-5 mins, Finals 7-15 mins.
Rules: Theme essential. No water/fire/animals. Non-performers must register.
Judging: Ramp Walk (35%), Costume (35%).

qna.q: What is Mr & Miss IGNUS?
qna.a:
**Mr & Miss IGNUS**
Format: Round 1 (Instagram Intro), Round 2 (Talent Show - Offline), Final (Ramp Walk + Q&A).
Judging: Likes/Comments (45% R1), Talent Originality (40% R2), Confidence/Style (35% Final).

qna.q: Who are the Fashion coordinators?
What Quizzes are available?
qna.a:
**General Quiz**: Everything under the sun.
**Meme Quiz**: Internet culture, viral trends.
**TLC Quiz**: Travel, Living, Culture, Literature.
**Bollywood Quiz**: Indian cinema, music, trivia.

Team Size: 1-3 members.
Format: Prelims (Written) -> Finals (Top 8).

qna.q: Who are the Quiz coordinators?
What Literature events are there?
qna.a:
**Word Games**: Anagrams, Rebuses, Pictionary, Taboo.
**Cryptic Crossword**: Solo, 1.5 hrs.
**Scrabble**: Solo, 44 mins.
**Slam Poetry**: English & Hindi/Urdu. Solo, 8 mins.
**Pun Wars**: Solo, 30 mins.
**JAM**: Solo, 1 min.
**Standup Comedy**: Solo, 8 mins.

qna.q: Who are the Literature coordinators?
What are the Digital Media competitions?
qna.a:
**Short Filmmaking**: Group, 6-15 mins. Theme: Loss.
**Photostory**: 5-15 photos. Theme: Fading Memories.
**Themed Photography**: Themes: Masks & Moods, Light After Dark.
**Photoshop Battle**: Team of 3, 6 hours.
**Reel Making**: 30-90 secs.

qna.q: Are there specific rules for Photography submission?
qna.a: Yes. You must submit both **RAW** and **Edited (JPEG)** files. Images must contain original **EXIF metadata**. No local editing is allowed (only global).

qna.q: Can I use AI tools in competitions?
qna.a: No. The use of Generative Fill or AI tools (like Midjourney) is **strictly prohibited**, especially in the Photoshop Battle. Violation leads to disqualification.

qna.q: What is IGMUN?
qna.a:
Ignus Model United Nations. A simulation of UN bodies to cultivate diplomacy and public speaking.
Flow: Roll Call -> Agenda -> Formal Debate -> Moderated/Unmoderated Caucus -> Resolutions -> Voting.
Dress Code: Formal business attire.

qna.q: What is the Code of Conduct for IGMUN?
qna.a: Delegates must maintain professionalism. Personal attacks, discriminatory remarks, and unparliamentary language are strictly prohibited. The Secretariat reserves the right to suspend or disqualify delegates.

qna.q: What are the important Registration Rules?
qna.a:
- **Flagship Events**: Must be registered by Team Lead only.
- **Pass Benefits**: Royal/Imperial passes include free access to Pronites, EDM, ProDay, and 1 event/day (excluding Flagship).
- **Workshops**: Paid basis; fees not included in any pass.
- **Disqualification**: The organising team reserves the right to disqualify any participant for misconduct.

qna.q: What items are prohibited?
qna.a: Alcohol, drugs, cigarettes, sharp objects, weapons, and flammable materials are strictly banned on campus.

qna.q: Is there medical assistance available?
qna.a: Yes, the IIT Jodhpur Primary Health Centre (PHC) is operational 24/7. An ambulance is also available on standby for emergencies.

qna.q: Who do I contact in an emergency?
qna.a: Use the 'SOS' button in the app profile or contact the nearest volunteer/security guard.

qna.q: My pass QR code is not showing or loading.
qna.a: First, ensure you have an active internet connection and try refreshing the profile page. If it still doesn't appear, **try logging out and logging back in**. This refreshes your session and often fixes display issues. If the problem persists, please visit the Registration Desk with your payment receipt.

qna.q: My registered events are not visible.
qna.a: This might be a sync issue. Try pulling down to refresh the events page. If they still don't show up, log out and log back in to re-sync your account data with the server.

qna.q: I am facing login issues or network errors.
qna.a: Check your network connection. If using campus Wi-Fi, try switching to mobile data. Ensure your app is updated to the latest version. If the issue persists, try clearing app cache or reinstalling.

qna.q: I forgot my password.
qna.a: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login screen to receive a reset link via email.
